value.title: Exception Reporting in Power BI Catch the Error Rows in Power Query
value.excerpt: To build a robust BI system, you need to cater for errors and handle errors carefully. If you build a reporting solution that the refresh of that fails everytime an error occurs, it is not a robust system. Errors can happen by many reasons, In this video, I‚Äôll show you a way to catch potential errors

value.title: Export the Data of a Power BI table entirely in a few Clicks

You can use Power BI Helper (free tool) to export the entire data of the table. The instruction below explains how it is

However, there is a simple way to hide or lock it from the user. In this article and video, I explain how that works. Read

value.title: Showing an alternate text when no data available in a Power BI chart visuals
value.excerpt: If you have a visual in the Power BI, that based on some selections of a slicer it might return nothing, depends on the visual, you might get a blank visual or some other types of improper view. In this video, I share a simple trick that you can use to have an alternate message in those scenarios. Read

value.title: Showing Ranking in a Visual in Power BI using RANKX DAX function
value.excerpt: If you want to show the ranking in a Power BI visual, one way is to use a visual that supports that, such as a Ribbon chart. value.title: Visualization Tip   Change to Filter instead of highlight   Control the Interaction in Power BI
value.excerpt: Power BI reports are highly interactive, If you select a column in a column chart other charts will be highlighted.
